parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can connect through SMS or QR-code, even email if you're connecting to a child. Go to: Settings -> My contacts -> Add contact
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can I connect with?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters need to connect with a child to use the app. Why? Because Gimi is for the children!
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do I need a child?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi's mission is to give children financial superskills. In order to do that, children need to be involved and be allowed to practice.
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can I add another supporter to my child?
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters can invite other supporters to their children. Just go to your child's settings, contacts and click invite.
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE You connect by inviting a supporter with an SMS, or scan a QR-code. Just go to: Settings -> My contacts -> Add contact
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can I connect with?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children need to connect with a supporter to use the app. It could be parents, grand parents or other family members. It's the supporters who pay you!
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How many supporters can I have?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can connect to multiple supporters! Invite the whole family!
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do children need a phone?
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can sign up with an email address or a phone number. They don't need their own phone, but they need to access the app on some device.
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE My child does not have an email address
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can sign up with an email address or a phone number. If they don't an email address, sign them up with yours!
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Is there an age limit?
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi does not have an age limit. But we recommend it from ages 7 and older.
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi is not connected to any bank, so the money is never moved from supporters' accounts. Gimi is a way to keep track of how much supporters owe their children!
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change currency?
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters can change the currency if they only have one child, and if that child does not have other connections. Go to: Settings -> User settings -> Currency
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: Supporters can change the currency if they only have one child, and if that child does not have other connections. Go to: Settings -> User settings -> Currency
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Payday is the day when the allowance is paid out! Money earned from chores, and savings interest is also added to savings, and a new countdown starts!
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change the day for Payday?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters can change Payday. Go to: Settings -> Children settings -> Payday, allowance and interest
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children learn better if their allowance is recurring and consistent. Separated parents are recommended to pay their half each week.
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How much allowance should I give?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE You decide how much your child is ready to manage, but when you set up the allowance in the Gimi app, we'll give you a recommendation based on the child's age.
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi is not connected to any bank, so the money is never moved from supporters' accounts. Gimi is a way to keep track of how much supporters owe their children!
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I get the money?
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ask your supporters, they hold the money! They will then make a deduction from your savings if they give you money or pay for something.
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Payday is the day when the allowance is paid out! Money earned from chores, and savings interest is also added to savings, and a new countdown starts!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change the day for Payday?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can do this, ask them!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_3: How much allowance should I get?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_3: Your parents decide how much allowance you should get, talk to them!
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change or delete a chore?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores can not be changed - you can make a deduct from the child's savings
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens to completed chores?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money you earn for doing chores are paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I turn on/off notifications?
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Push notifications will remind you about important events. Just go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_question: How do I turn on/off notifications?
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_answer_1: Push notifications will remind you about important events. Just go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I get the money?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ask your supporters, they hold the money! They will then make a deduction from your savings if they give you money or pay for something.
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change or delete a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores can not be changed - you can make a deduct from the child's savings
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens to completed chores?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money you earn for doing chores are paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Payday is the day when the allowance is paid out! Money earned from chores, and savings interest is also added to savings, and a new countdown starts!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Congratulations! You can ask your supporters to buy it for you, or just archive it and start saving for a new dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete, or create a new dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Just click on your dream image! From here you can edit or delete your current dream.
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I turn on/off notifications?
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Push notifications will remind you about important events. Just go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off
parent_faq_section_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master & The Gimi card
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app, for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending, and an account for savings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card is a Mastercard Prepaid card, issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why is the Gimi card better?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card is connected to the Gimi app. It not only enables children to pay, but also teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but parents have the option to block online spending. Parents also get full insight into spending behavior, and smart notifications about card activity.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Is my child ready for a card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE Parents decide when their children are ready for a card, there is no universal age. But we recommend it from 10 years and older. Still not sure? We have a card test for children, they will find it in "settings" in the app or on our website.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Where can the Gimi card be used?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE The card can be used online, and in all stores. The card does not work in ATMs, and at some merchants that we blocked, as they are not appropriate to children.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card in the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can the money be sent back?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi does not support refunds of money that's been transferred to the Gimi card or the Gimi account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: Can the money be sent back?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_4: Gimi does not support refunds of money that's been transferred to the Gimi card or the Gimi account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How much does the Gimi card cost?
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE The card is included in the Gimi Master subscription. Supporters pay a subscription fee to upgrade to Gimi Master. The price varies depending on wheter you pay monthly, yearly or for a lifetime. And if there is an ongoing campaign, or if you have a promo code. To get an updated pricelist, go to subscriptions in Settings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters must first buy a Gimi Master subscription, before ordering the card. Just go to Settings and Subscriptions, then upgrade to Master by purchasing a subscription in App Store or Play store.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can order the Gimi card, and it's only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address in Sweden.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I activate the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Just go to the new card account and press "Activate"! But you might want to wait until the card arrives...
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE When will the card arrive?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I block the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> Card settings -> Toggle off "Card is active"
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card was lost!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you think you lost it, lock the card. If you find it, you can just unlock it again! If you can't find it, keep it locked and contact us to get a replacement card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Lock the card immediately! Go to: Settings -> Card settings -> Press the button "Card is active" and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to get a replacement.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I unblock a blocked card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE If the card has been blocked by a supporter, then only he/she can unblock it. If the child blocked it, he/she can just unblock it same way!
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why do I need an app passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change my passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> Children settings -> General settings -> Master subscription, then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens if I cancel?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you end your Gimi Master subscripition, the card and the account will be closed. Gimi will go back to the free tracker version.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens with the money?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you have any funds left on the card or account after cancellation, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com so that we can transfer the money back to your bank account.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I suggest a chore?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children simply go to the "Earn" tab. Here, click a category under the "suggest chore" section. Then choose among the chores that we suggest or create your own!
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change or delete a chore?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores can not be changed - you can make a deduct from the child's savings
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens to completed chores?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money you earn for doing chores are paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I start saving for a Dream?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Dream -> Click Add. You can choose among the popular ones or create your own!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Congratulations! You can ask your supporters to buy it for you, or just archive it and start saving for a new dream!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete, or create a new dream?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Just click on your dream image! From here you can edit or delete your current dream.
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can order a Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can order the Gimi card, and it's only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address in Sweden.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I activate my Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Just go to the new card account and press "Activate"! But you might want to wait until the card arrives...
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE When will the card arrive?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I block the Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> Card settings -> Toggle off "Card is active"
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I lost my Gimi card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you think you lost it, lock the card. If you find it, you can just unlock it again! If you can't find it, keep it locked and contact us to get a replacement card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Lock your card immediately! Go to: Settings -> Card settings -> Press the button "Card is active" and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to get a replacement.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I unblock a blocked card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE If the card has been blocked by a supporter, then only he/she can unblock it. If you blocked it, just unblock it same way!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE I forgot my PIN code!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE No worries, you can always see your card PIN in the app. Just go to: Settings -> Show PIN. Or find the Show PIN button on the card account.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I entered the wrong PIN code
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you type the wrong PIN code 3 times, the card will be automatically blocked. You can unblock it in card settings!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE My purchase didn't go through
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE First check your balance to see if you have enough money on the card, and that the card is active. If this is not the reason, please contact us and we'll figure it out!
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why do I need an app passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change my passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete my user account?
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to create a new user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
kid_faq_section_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master & The Gimi card
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app, for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending, and an account for savings.
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi card is a Mastercard Prepaid card, issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How is my personal data protected at Gimi?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legeal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How can I delete my personal data?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Important! It's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete my user account?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to create a new user account
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
